values: On Preterism and Postmillenialism: A Brief Introduction to PreterismOn Preterism and Postmillenialism

Pastor Steve Jeffery makes an argument that biblical prophecies about Jesus’ teachings on the end of the age and the establishment of his kingdom are about a time period shortly to follow his ministry. He then connects this view of biblical prophecy (preterism) with his view of the growth of the church and the reign of the […]
